Header.title: Know your UNIQUE BODY TYPE in < 10 Minutes
Header.paragraph: Wanna know.... Your Personalized Daily Routine Best and Worst Foods for You Prevention of Your Common Diseases

About.paragraph: At SwasthVritta - We are availing our users the platform where they can consult with Ayurveda Doctors and Health Advisors in 18 different Specialties through both Online and Offline modes. Our Mission is reaching the Best Ayurveda Doctors all over globe and avail best of their services for all of our users. SignUp with us to be the part of an Incredible Ecosystem of Health

Features.title: Know Your Prakriti
Features.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet placerat facilisis felis mi in tempus eleifend pellentesque natoque etiam.

Prakriti1.question: Does your skin remain moist throughout the year?
Prakriti1.option2: B) Mostly dry except in some seasons
Prakriti1.option3: C) Mostly moist except a particular season

Prakriti1.question: Do you have thick black hair?
Do you have a tendency to gain weight?
Prakriti1.option2: B)Can gain, but can lose weight easily
Prakriti1.option3: C)Gain easily, but take time to lose
Prakriti1.option4: D)Difficult to lose , difficult to gain

Prakriti1.question: Is your physique well-build by nature or plump or overweight?
Do you start work only after proper planning?
Prakriti1.option3: C)I plan most of the times

Prakriti1.question: Do you usually take time to understand but can recall quickly?
Prakriti1.option1: A)Understand quickly but cannot recall easily
Prakriti1.option2: B)Understand quickly ad can recall easily
Prakriti1.option3: C)Takes time to understand and can recall most of the time
Prakriti1.option4: Takes time to understand but can easily recall

Prakriti1.question: Do you tend to consume less food and liquids in comparison to others?
Prakriti1.option1: A)I eat and drink very less
Prakriti1.option2: I eat very less most of the time

Prakriti1.question: Do you sweat less and is it odourless?
Prakriti1.option1: A)I sweat a lot even without any exercise
Prakriti1.option2: B)I sweat a lot during exercise

Prakriti1.question: Do you enjoy sitting in one place for a long time?
Do you sleep well and not easily awakened?
